CatDescriptText: Information on poster inscribed "324 Emerson St., East Liberty, Admission-Advance Price $1.50 - At Door $2.00 tax included, Tickets on Sale at Volkwein Music Store, 637 Liberty Avenue, Lee's Flower Shop 2117[?] Centre Ave.  Lincoln Drug Store Frankstown Ave., E.E., Auspices Pyramid Club, Gale Agency Inc. Presents Salute the Champ Joe Louis World's Heavyweight Champ in Person , A Gala Entertainment and Dance, Meet the Champ and Dance All Evening, Luis Russell and his orchestra, Bettie Mays the Pin-Up Songstress, Extra Added Attraction! Ralph Cooper Favorite Screen Star!"
TitMainTitle: Woman wearing dark dress seated in booth, possibly in Crawford Grill No. 1, with poster on wall inscribed "Hunt Armory Tues. Eve. Salute the champ Joe Louis..."
